extends Polkadot

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Ball()
      Instantiates a default Ball Default balls have a random dX(change in x-coordinate) and dY(change in y-coordinate Default balls inherit all characteristics of a default polkadot
